snippet: Israel said it would target tunnels that could infiltrate its territory after cease-fire talks failed to de-escalate the air war that had raged for 10 days.
abstract: Israeli tanks roll into northern Gaza Strip and naval gunboats attack targets in the south as Israel begins ground invasion; Israeli leaders say incursion is a limited one focused on tunnels into its territory and is not intended to topple Hamas.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and ANNE BARNARD
byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren reported from Jerusalem, and Anne Barnard from Gaza. Reporting was contributed by Isabel Kershner, Gabby Sobelman and Irit Pazner Garshowitz from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: Israel said it would target tunnels that could infiltrate its territory after cease-fire talks failed to de-escalate the air war that had raged for 10 days.

headline.sub: After 10-Day Air War, Military Is Targeting Tunnels
headline.main: Israeli Military Invades Gaza, With Sights Set on Hamas Operations
headline.print_headline: Israeli Military Invades Gaza, With Sights Set on Hamas Operations
